channel.title: December 2013 - TabbyKiller interview questions
channel.description: [ul][li]To start the interview, please tell us a bit about yourself. You can let us know about hobbies, aspirations, or anything else you'd like to share.[/li] [li]What originally brought you to MoparScape and what in particular, if anything, kept you here all this time?[/li] [li]What do you realistically see yourself doing in five years time?[/li] [li]Has your opinion of the community changed at all since you have become a moderator? If so, how?[/li] [li]Which member of MoparScape would you have to say is the most inspirational, and why?[/li] [li]What advice would you give to someone wishing to become more involved in the community?[/li] [li]What attracted you to photography, and why do you pursue it as a hobby?[/li] [li]What would be your main tip to anyone interesting in starting photography?[/li] [li]Which user in the community would you describe as "most likely to be successful", and in which field?[/li] [li]If you had to liken MoparScape to any video game, which one would you choose, and why?[/li] [li]To close the interview, do you have any final words?[/li][/ul]

item.title: December 2013 - TabbyKiller interview questions
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:2, topic:537447”]Looks good altogether, good work. I’m looking forward to his responses.
By the way, don’t be afraid to try and squeeze out some more questions along the way. If you think of something during the interview go ahead and ask.[/quote]

Thanks What is the deadline?

item.title: December 2013 - TabbyKiller interview questions
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[ul][li]To start the interview, please tell us a bit about yourself. You can let us know about hobbies, aspirations, or anything else you’d like to share.[/li]
[li]What originally brought you to MoparScape and what in particular, if anything, kept you here all this time?[/li]
[li]What do you realistically see yourself doing in five years time?[/li]
[li]Has your opinion of the community changed at all since you have become a moderator? If so, how?[/li]
[li]Which member of MoparScape would you have to say is the most inspirational, and why?[/li]
[li]What advice would you give to someone wishing to become more involved in the community?[/li]
[li]What attracted you to photography, and why do you pursue it as a hobby?[/li]
[li]What would be your main tip to anyone interesting in starting photography?[/li]
[li]Which user in the community would you describe as “most likely to be successful”, and in which field?[/li]
[li]If you had to liken MoparScape to any video game, which one would you choose, and why?[/li]
[li]To close the interview, do you have any final words?[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
